channel.title: Project Imploding -under construction
channel.description:
[img]http://minecraftservers.net/images/serverpics/3697_IMG.png[/img] [u][b]Features:[/b][/u] [b] .[b][u]First [/u][/b]to come [u][b]recieves[/b][/u] job of their choice following with the custom yell .Holds 20 players .mobarena .jobs .Ops available to apply on .Intelligent staff (we know about you [b][s][u]griefers[/u][/s][/b]) :D .Server will most likely always be on unless updates occur or downtime .We could use some builders-crafters [u]How to play?[/u] .ip is projectimploding.no-ip.info .Ops applications will be updated later and the forums will come in time. Our Goals: .To create a friendly server .To have fun (were not total *****:D) .To obtain a stable server [u]Info:[/u] .The servers texture pack is the default (im not posting my customized one) .This is a fairly new server so dont expect much on your first trip .We dont spawn [size=18pt][color=red]Anything![/color][/size] unless someone needs somehing thats reasonable.[/b] [b][u][size=12pt]Jobs: .[color=black]Miner .[color=orange]Builder[/color] .[color=limegreen]Woodcutter[/color] .[color=brown]Hunter[/color] .[color=blue]Farmer[/color] .[color=yellow]Digger[/color][/color][/size][/u][/b]
[img]http://i816.photobucket.com/albums/zz83/rigglegigglegiggle101/pic.png[/img]

item.title: Project Imploding -under construction
item.dc:creator: @ProjectImploding ProjectImploding
item.description:
@ProjectImploding wrote:


Features:

.First to come recieves job of their choice following with the custom yell
.Holds 20 players
.mobarena
.jobs
.Ops available to apply on
.Intelligent staff (we know about you griefers)
.Server will most likely always be on unless updates occur or downtime
.We could use some builders-crafters
How to play?
.ip is projectimploding.no-ip.info
.Ops applications will be updated later and the forums will come in time.
Our Goals:
.To create a friendly server
.To have fun (were not total *****:D)
.To obtain a stable server
Info:
.The servers texture pack is the default (im not posting my customized one)
.This is a fairly new server so dont expect much on your first trip
.We dont spawn [size=18pt][color=red]Anything![/color][/size]
unless someone needs somehing thats reasonable.
[size=12pt]Jobs:
.[color=black]Miner
.[color=orange]Builder[/color]
.[color=limegreen]Woodcutter[/color]
.[color=brown]Hunter[/color]
.[color=blue]Farmer[/color]
.[color=yellow]Digger[/color][/color][/size]

pic.png1024Ã—718
